name: G.H.O.S.T. Chronicles: Phantom of the Renaissance Faire
name_original: G.H.O.S.T. Chronicles: Phantom of the Renaissance Faire
description:
G.H.O.S.T. Chronicles: Phantom of the Renaissance Faire is a game developed by Aisle 5 Games. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Big Fish Games.
G.H.O.S.T. Chronicles: Phantom of the Renaissance Faire is available on PC.
